data.title: TCG unveils plans to help SMEs convert NPLs to standard debt
data.description: State institution opens communication channel for these debtors to engage in discussions and find solutions

data.title: Historic $100-bn boost for International Development Association
data.description: World Bank says amount will be deployed in 78 countries, to assist in key areas

data.title: BMA announces Green Festival 2024
data.description: Festival December 13-15 aims to promote the conservation of large trees as the lifeblood and lungs of communities

data.title: Government to implement measures against illegal ‘nominees’

data.title: Bus stop controversy in Samut Prakan goes viral
data.description: Contractor poured concrete that levelled up with seating area, making it impossible to use

data.title: Couple arrested for duping job seekers
data.description: Police have arrested a couple who allegedly duped job seekers into paying them 70,000 baht each to arrange  jobs overseas  but provided them with nothing but  fake documents .

data.title: Myanmar yet to return four detained Thai fishermen
data.description: Situation remains uncertain, and process depends on Myanmar government

data.title: Trump returns to world stage at Notre-Dame reopening
data.description: PARIS - US President-elect Donald Trump returns to the world stage on Saturday to join leaders for the reopening of Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris, still a private citizen but already preparing to tackle a host of international crises.

data.title: 2nd phase of 10,000-baht handout to happen before Feb, govt insists
data.description: Rumours on social media that government has no money to continue the handout campaign denied

data.title: American tourist electrocuted in Phuket
data.description: An American tourist was killed when he slipped on a wet sidewalk and was  electrocuted  by a faulty streetlight in  Phuket , authorities said on Friday.

data.title: Phumtham seeks closer security ties with Sweden
data.description: In meeting with ambassador, defence minister hails progress in security and defence industry cooperation

data.title: Dick Van Dyke, approaching 99, dances in Coldplay’s latest video
data.description: NEW YORK — Dick Van Dyke, the lithe and witty nonagenarian whose career spans more than seven decades, has added yet another role to his lengthy resume: music video star.

data.title: CP Foods leads sustainable environmental care on Thai Environment Day
data.description: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited (CP Foods) is uniting with all sectors to drive environmental stewardship, and jointly creating a better, more sustainable future for all life on Earth. This effort marks “Thai Environment Day” on December 4, followed by World Soil Day on December 5th—highlighting the vital importance of our environment.

data.title: 'No progress made' by Joint Technical Committee on Cambodia
data.description: The government has admitted that the establishment of a Joint Technical Committee (JTC) to negotiate with Cambodia on disputed maritime areas has not made any progress and is still in the process of being formed, according to Deputy Prime Minister Phumtham Wechayachai.

data.title: Thai pilots oppose permission for foreigners to fly domestic routes
data.description: Association seeks review of decision, denies shortage of local pilots

data.title: Kirins, Port make ACL 2 2nd round
data.description: Muang Thong United secured their place in the knockout stage after a dramatic 1-0 victory over Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors in the AFC Champions League Two at Rajamangala Stadium on Thursday night.

data.title: JR East to increase fares by 7%
data.description: TOKYO — East Japan Railway Company said Friday it has applied to the transport ministry to raise its train fares by an average 7.1% beginning March 2026, its first blanket fare hike since the company

data.title: Thai crew members not yet released by Myanmar
data.description: Myanmar authorities have yet to release four Thai crew members, citing the need to follow proper procedures.

data.title: Gift-giving galore
data.description: The joyous season is around the corner and Guru By Bangkok Post has a list of gifts for everyone on your list
